signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper above(final int codePoint)
name: above
javadoc:
/**
     * Constructs a {@code JavaUnicodeEscaper} above the specified value (exclusive).
     *
     * @param codePoint
     *            above which to escape
     * @return The newly created {@code UnicodeEscaper} instance
     */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper below(final int codePoint)
name: below
javadoc:
/**
     * Constructs a {@code JavaUnicodeEscaper} below the specified value (exclusive).
     *
     * @param codePoint
     *            below which to escape
     * @return The newly created {@code UnicodeEscaper} instance
     */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper between(final int codePointLow, final int codePointHigh)
name: between
javadoc:
/**
     * Constructs a {@code JavaUnicodeEscaper} between the specified values (inclusive).
     *
     * @param codePointLow
     *            above which to escape
     * @param codePointHigh
     *            below which to escape
     * @return The newly created {@code UnicodeEscaper} instance
     */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper outsideOf(final int codePointLow, final int codePointHigh)
name: outsideOf
javadoc:
/**
     * Constructs a {@code JavaUnicodeEscaper} outside of the specified values (exclusive).
     *
     * @param codePointLow
     *            below which to escape
     * @param codePointHigh
     *            above which to escape
     * @return The newly created {@code UnicodeEscaper} instance
     */

name: toUtf16Escape
javadoc:
/**
     * Converts the given code point to a hexadecimal string of the form {@code "\\uXXXX\\uXXXX"}.
     *
     * @param codePoint
     *            a Unicode code point
     * @return The hexadecimal string for the given code point
     */
